name: iKlondike Solitaire
description:
iKlondike — from the creator of Klondike, the original solitaire game for Mac.

"Now THIS is my good old Klondike that I know and love!!!" Markham, Ontario

With realistic cards and drag-and-drop play, iKlondike features some of the most intuitive solitaire gameplay available from the App Store.

The ingenious scoring scheme tracks time played and number of cards in the foundations -- and adds a bonus for a completed round. You'll be able to see your skill level rise with practice!

iKlondike highlights:
• Five customizable solitaire games: Klondike, Canfield, Racing Demons, Freecell and Golf
• Launches quickly, right to the last point of play
• Shake your phone to shuffle & deal a new round
• Easy shortcuts for New Round, Move to Foundation, and Undo
• High scores listed for each game
• Handoff game in progress to other iOS, Mac OS X devices
